name: Softened Cookie
description:
"Softened Cookie"Is a competitive game where the player's goal is to achieve a "fast orgasm". The goal in this game is to "finish" as quickly as possible and thereby force the enemy to eat the cookie with the condensed milk. Firmly grasp and slide your mouse up and down to create FRICTION and SPEED.
Key features:
- Optimized 3D design.
- A rare genre. Very few similar games.
- 4 random locations to spawn from.
- High-quality sound design.


"Description translated by Luadros"
